title: Oracle ERP - Fundamental Concepts & Principles
headline: After completing this free online course, you will possess a stronger understanding of this resource planning software.
description: This free online course takes a practical approach to explaining the major fundamentals of Oracle ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning). You will learn about the Oracle E-Business Suite Architecture and its implementation through six phases to help you to understand this subject better. In addition, we will review a comparison between Oracle EBS and Oracle Cloud service's technical specifications and terms so you can implement it correctly.
courseDescription:
Oracle ERP is considered one of the most renowned software solutions designed for enterprise management. This American software company provides premium cloud and platform services called Oracle. With Oracle in a business structure, companies and enterprises can benefit in several ways but it needs to be fully implemented and integrated into an enterprise's structure in order to deliver its complete benefits. It is therefore essential for enterprises wanting to implement Oracle ERP to learn about its implementation procedure.

Keeping the need of enterprises in mind, this free course has been designed to explain the various Oracle modules and applications. It also discusses the reasons why an enterprise should select Oracle ERP and the benefits which it can garner after its implementation. This course discusses Oracle E-Business Suite Architecture in great detail, along with its three tiers and important nomenclature.

After completing this course, you will be able to recognize Oracle cloud services and perform a detailed comparison between Oracle EBS and Oracle ERP. It discusses the implementation of ERP in six comprehensive phases and various technical terms are explained. This course also answers some of the most common queries related to Oracle ERP.
